ISSUE.TITLE: Some jvm_* metrics aren't labelled correctly
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: JVM metrics aren't labelled with common labels that we apply to all the `org_apache_cassandra_metrics*` ones such as: cluster, datacenter, rack, pod_name, node_name. We need all jvm metrics to be labelled appropriately so that we can build consistent dashboards. ```[tasklist] ### Definition of Done - [x] `jvm_*` metrics are labelled like the `org_apache_cassandra_metrics` are ```
